AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: has the burden of proof under guidelines, governing body, responsible for proving by a preponderance of the evidence that a temporal and spatial relation existed between a weapon and a drug trafficking offense
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. District Court: court that found the totality of the circumstances provided Andrew P. Graham and Jay Snodgrass with reasonable suspicion to warrant the stop of the large white Ford pickup truck, identified Brignoni-Ponce factors supporting the validity of the stop, made a determination regarding the proximity-to-the-border element, applied a two-level upward adjustment for possession of a weapon in connection with a drug trafficking offense
